PACKAGE PCKG_AUTH IS
  -- Author  : Tariq Sarwar
  -- Created : 1/1/2005 10:44:03 AM
  -- Purpose : Handle Authorization Related Procedures and processes

  -- Public type declarations

  REPORT_PASSWORD VARCHAR2(255) := 'It Is A Report';

  FUNCTION GET_REPORT_PASSWORD RETURN VARCHAR2;

  -- this procedure is called from all authorization's transactional triggers
  PROCEDURE GET_INITIAL_AUTHORIZATION(PARM_FOR            VARCHAR2,
                                      PARM_INV_BOOK_ID    IN NUMBER,
                                      PARM_AUTH_STATUS_ID OUT NUMBER,
                                      PARM_AUTH_YN        OUT NUMBER);

  PROCEDURE HANDLE_AUTHORIZATION_UPDATE(PARM_DOC_TYPE_ID        NUMBER,
                                        PARM_OLD_AUTHORIZED_YN  IN NUMBER,
                                        PARM_NEW_AUTHORIZED_YN  IN OUT NUMBER,
                                        PARM_OLD_SEND_FOR_AUTH  IN NUMBER,
                                        PARM_NEW_SEND_FOR_AUTH  IN OUT NUMBER,
                                        PARM_OLD_AUTH_ID        IN NUMBER,
                                        PARM_NEW_AUTH_ID        IN OUT NUMBER,
                                        PARM_OLD_AUTH_STATUS_ID IN NUMBER,
                                        PARM_NEW_AUTH_STATUS_ID IN OUT NUMBER,

                                        PARM_NEW_POST_TO_GL NUMBER, -- ONLY FOR POSTING FORMS

                                        PARM_INV_BOOK_ID       NUMBER,
